items: Is await always wrapped in a try/catch block or handled with .catch()?
Are multiple independent async operations executed in parallel with Promise.all()?
Is await avoided inside loops (preferring Promise.all or for...of for sequentiality)?
Are async functions returning a Promise explicitly typed if using TypeScript?
Is there a mechanism to handle potential 'unhandled promise rejections'?
Are timeouts implemented for async operations that may hang indefinitely?
